title: Bamiri: the story of a village that helped itself
creator_contributor_role: Gold Coast Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Village communities - Africa
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Community development
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Africa - Social conditions
description: The story of a village that helped itself. When the villagers of Bamiri in Ashanti decided to build themselves a Community Centre they scarcely realised how this would stimulate the progress of the village. Now the people of Bamiri are not only improving their village materially, but they are educating themselves in many other ways. No other credits available.
